CatDescriptText: Mr. Fred Fisher, Penn Camera Co. employee, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 28, 1957, pg. A1, with question: "What do you think of race relations here in Pittsburgh?" Answer reads: "I've never given much thought to race relations in Pittsburgh. However, from what I read in newspapers, the relations here between the races seem to be all right.  I've never read about any bad incidents."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Fred Fisher standing in front of Penn Camera and Islay's, Smithfield Street, Downtown
